mapper.select: select t.id, t.store_id as storeId, m.title as storeTitle, r.cover_url as coverUrl, r.title, t.quantity, ps.sale_price as salePrice, t.sale_price as rawSalePrice, r.quota as quota, if(second_spec_value is null, concat(ps.primary_spec_value, '-', ps.second_spec_value), ps.primary_spec_value) as skuName, ps.stock, ps.deleted as skuState, r.state as productState from shopping_cart t left join item_store m on t.store_id = m.id left join item r on t.item_id = r.id left join item_sku ps on t.sku_id = ps.id where t.deleted = false and t.member_id = #{memberId} order by t.id desc
